body: That thick, bulbous, mushroomhead, cockhead, tip, glans. No one draws it better

i am just, GRIPPED, by anticipation.
Woah. What’s going on with this war over hentai translations?

@Shadowlell The whole "if you don't like it don't read it" attitude doesn't work here since you refuse to clearly state that your version is a rewrite and not a translation. People look for translation because they can't understand japanese, so they have no way of knowing whether your dialogue is legit or not, they just assume that the translator atleast ATTEMPTED to be true to the source (because that's what 99% of translators do). 

If you wanna complain about the typesetting being lazy, that's fine, but please stop lying to people before you start calling others out on "dick moves".

@Zek56 I mean, hey, if people don't like the versions I upload, they're more than free to do their own version (or wait till someone else does). But taking the pages I worked on and reuploading them with their edits thrown in (because apparently they were too lazy to actually put in any time and effort to do a proper version themselves) and calling is a "fixed" is a dick move. At the very least, dude could have matched the font up so it doesn't look like a hot mess.
Is there any way to get this gallery removed? Some prick took the version I translated and "fixed it" with his shitty, mismatched font and akward sentences.

it seems that this will be an interesting cock clash,lets see how big can  Koyuki get and resist against Cyan.Now I wonder,Cyan will eventually mets Kana,the boss of the super cock club, in this crossover?In that case,that will be a true dick titan figth ,I guess we will find out,anyway,thank you very much for the quick translation,you are doing an awesome Job,love Teterun works!
